### rUM

**rUM** is an R package for structuring reproducible academic manuscripts within a new RStudio project. Compose journal-worthy articles in either Quarto or RMarkdown and code your results into the analysis.

::: { .cntr-btn }
[Download Package](https://public.tableau.com/app/profile/wayne.defreitas/viz/HCS_PUBDISP_Final20210222/Dashboard1){target="_blank" .btn}

### tidyREDCap

**tidyREDCap** is an R package with functions for processing REDCap data. [REDCap (Research Electronic Data CAPture)](https://projectredcap.org) is a web-enabled application for building and managing surveys and databases developed at Vanderbilt University.

### public.ctn0094data

**public.ctn0094data** is an R package of harmonized/normalized data sets produced as part of the Clinical Trials Network (CTN) protocol number 0094. The data describe the experiences of care seeking individuals suffering from opioid use disorder (OUD). This is a US National Institute of Drug Abuse (NIDA) funded project; to learn more go to [https://ctnlibrary.org/protocol/ctn0094/](https://ctnlibrary.org/protocol/ctn0094/). 

::: { .cntr-btn }
[Download Package](https://ctn-0094.github.io/public.ctn0094data/){target="_blank" .btn}
:::
